title: An Interview with Allan Couper
creator_contributor_role: Victoria. Dept. of Planning and Community Development, partner

abstract: It was always said on the squadron, if you survived the first three, you had a fair chance. Well, we very nearly didn't.
description: Allan Couper is a Victorian World War II veteran. He served as a pilot in Europe as part of the Bomber Squadron. As part of the Digital Storytelling project "In our words", Allan relates his experiences of fighting in Europe during the war.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: Compilation title; B2001764; In our words: stories from Victorian veterans [May 2009]; Active; 2009
